channel.title: Trying to run battlescape client give me this
channel.description:
when i try to run battlescape client show me this
[code]BattleScape Client Version #2.2 # # An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x6d8a1718, pid=5268, tid=3340 # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (10.0-b23 mixed mode windows-x86) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0xe1718] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Documents and Settings\dark\Desktop\haqim182 folder\BattleScape_V2.2\Battle Scape_V2.2\BattleScape V2.2\ClientFiles\hs_err_pid5268.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and i try to run my 508 client show me this [code]# # An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x6d8a1718, pid=4992, tid=4944 # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (10.0-b23 mixed mode, sharing windows-x86)
# Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0xe1718] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Documents and Settings\dark\Desktop\Dark Client 508\files\hs_err_pid4992.lo g # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Trying to run battlescape client give me this
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“ion5005, post:5, topic:233414”]This happens to me. I reboot my PC and it is fine.[/quote]u rite i did that thx rep

item.title: Trying to run battlescape client give me this
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

Get a later version of you’re java. It seems that it could also be administrator rights on your computer. Try running as admin…

Read full topic
